events.title: UCSF Rare Disease Symposium 2026
events.description: Team CDKL5 Gene Therapy is honored to participate as panelists at the UCSF Rare Disease Symposium 2026. Join us for 'Moving Mountains: Reyna's Story and the Summit Still Ahead for CDKL5 Gene Therapy.'

speakers.name: Jacinthe Gingras, PhD
speakers.role: Scientific Advisor, Child's Cure Genetics Research

speakers.name: Nalin Gupta, MD, PhD
speakers.role: Chief, Division of Pediatric Neurosurgery at UCSF

speakers.name: Sohela Shah, PhD
speakers.role: Program Director, Catalyst Program and Invent Fund, UCSF

events.hostedBy: UCSF Innovation Ventures, Foundation Ipsen & UCSF Institute for Human Genetics
events.location: William J. Rutter Center (Robertson Auditorium), UCSF Mission Bay, 1675 Owens St, San Francisco, CA 94158

events.title: Inside the CDKL5 Gene Therapy Journey
events.description: A comprehensive look at the UCSF Clinical Dinner where the Phase I trial was presented. Read the full story by Nyesha Bahl & Nicholas Schein.
events.hostedBy: University of California San Francisco & Child's Cure Genetic Research

events.title: Gene Therapy for CDKL5: The History, Progress & Next Steps
events.description: The US FDA has provided positive feedback + IND suggestions for gene replacement therapy for CDKL5.
events.hostedBy: American Society of Gene + Cell Therapy & Child's Cure Genetic Research
